com.geolud.atomica.objects

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geolud.atomica.objects.Token
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomToken, IndicatorToken

    public abstract class Token
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Abstract class representing a token on a field. A token object has a certain color and can be created either as an AtomToken or IndicatorToken. If a token is placed on a field it holds a reference to it.
    Author:
    Georg Ludewig
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Token(int colorIndex)
      Default constructor for creating a token with the given color index.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getColorIndex()
      Returns the color identifier of the token.
      Token getCopy()
      Creates a copy of the token without taking over the fields reference.

      Returns the field on which the token is currently placed on.
      void setColorIndex(int colorIndex)
      Sets the color identifier of the token.
      void setField(Field field)
      Sets the field on which the token shall be placed on.
